recipesJson.name: Gypsy Summer
recipesJson.author: Wildgypsy
recipesJson.description: Not exactly seasonal, but......a nice, refreshing vape. I’ve always loved mint and lime juice on my watermelon in real life.....so why not make it vapable! The Candied Watermelon added that sweet punch I was looking for without adding any sweetener. Hope y’all like it!
